verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] Al-tashheth. A Mikhtam of David.) Do you indeed <S%H552><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> righteousness, <S%H6664><s%> O gods <S%H410><s%>? Do you judge <S%H8199><s%> uprightly, <S%H4339><s%> O sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>?
No, <S%H637><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%> you work <S%H6466><s%> unrighteousness; <S%H9390><s%> On earth <S%H776><s%> you weigh <S%H6424><s%> out the violence <S%H2555><s%> of your hands. <S%H3027><s%>
The wicked <S%H7563><s%> are estranged <S%H2114><s%> from the womb; <S%H7358><s%> These who speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> go <S%H8582><s%> astray <S%H8582><s%> from birth. <S%H990><s%>

They have venom <S%H2534><s%> like <S%H1823><s%> the venom <S%H2534><s%> of a serpent; <S%H5175><s%> Like <S%H3644><s%> a deaf <S%H2795><s%> cobra <S%H6620><s%> that stops <S%H331><s%> up its ear, <S%H241><s%>
So <S%H834><s%> that it does not hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of charmers, <S%H3907><s%> [Or] a skillful <S%H2449><s%> caster <S%H2266><s%> of spells. <S%H2267><s%>

O God, <S%H430><s%> shatter <S%H2040><s%> their teeth <S%H8127><s%> in their mouth; <S%H6310><s%> Break <S%H5422><s%> out the fangs <S%H4973><s%> of the young <S%H3715><s%> lions, <S%H3715><s%> O Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

Let them flow <S%H9242><s%> away like <S%H3644><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> that runs <S%H1980><s%> off; <S%H1980><s%> [When] he aims <S%H1869><s%> his arrows, <S%H2671><s%> let them be as headless <S%H9269><s%> shafts. <S%H4135><s%>

[Let them be] as a snail <S%H7642><s%> which melts <S%H8557><s%> away <S%H8557><s%> as it goes <S%H1980><s%> along, [Like] the miscarriages <S%H5309><s%> of a woman <S%H802><s%> which never <S%H1077><s%> see <S%H2372><s%> the sun. <S%H8121><s%>

Before <S%H2962><s%> your pots <S%H5518><s%> can feel <S%H995><s%> [the fire of] thorns, <S%H329><s%> He will sweep <S%H9621><s%> them away <S%H9621><s%> with a whirlwind, <S%H9621><s%> the green <S%H2416><s%> and the burning <S%H2740><s%> alike. <S%H3644><s%>

The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will rejoice <S%H8055><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> he sees <S%H2372><s%> the vengeance; <S%H5359><s%> He will wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet <S%H6471><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

And men <S%H120><s%> will say, <S%H559><s%> "Surely <S%H389><s%> there is a reward <S%H6529><s%> for the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> Surely <S%H389><s%> there <S%H3426><s%> is a God <S%H430><s%> who judges <S%H8199><s%> on earth! <S%H776><s%>"
